Articles.Content:
Hmm, is there anything appearing in your Debug Log during the lag?

Press Alt+F2 to bring it up on Windows/OSX and RShift+F2 on Linux.
Thanks for this mod for some reason F1 or F12 to take screenshots hasn't been working for a few weeks but this mod allows me to make screenshots thanks.
Will this work with .24?

Will this work with .24?

Yes it does, I was even able to go all the way up to 10 with mine, it just took forever.
A must have mod! Downloaded!

Pardon the necro-mancy, but I have BOSS 2.1.5 running in 0.25, and it works well with 2x supersampling.

(It's never been able to handle more, which is no real shock given I'm still on a 32-bit system.)

You don't need it with 0.25 any longer, if you're only using the supersampling functionality.

Open settings.cfg and set "SCREENSHOT_SUPERSIZE" to whatever you want.
Indeed, Taverius speaks the truth. When I get a moment, I'll plan out the future of this plugin as it would still be useful to change the value on the fly.
The burst screenshot feature is also still useful.
Oh YES, please keep this going.......

You don't need it with 0.25 any longer, if you're only using the supersampling functionality.

Open settings.cfg and set "SCREENSHOT_SUPERSIZE" to whatever you want.

Indeed, Taverius speaks the truth. When I get a moment, I'll plan out the future of this plugin as it would still be useful to change the value on the fly.

Thanks, both of you! My only serious complaint with BOSS is that it saves screenshots in its own directory, rather than in the stock /Screenshots directory. Taverius' tip should fix that issue handily.

But yes, the burst shot feature was also really useful and I hope BOSS sticks around!
Is this going to be supported for 0.90 and future?
Second that... Will this wonderful mod come back??????

Its built in to the game now....

- - - Updated - - -

its in the stock game in the config file

Its built in to the game now....

- - - Updated - - -

its in the stock game in the config file

really? I wasn't aware that KSP has its own screenshot key.

really? I wasn't aware that KSP has its own screenshot key.

F1 is the screenshot key.

Necro posting?

Also close the thread thanks.
It's only a few months, in no way is that a necro. Also, does the burst function still work in .90?

You don't need it with 0.25 any longer, if you're only using the supersampling functionality.

Open settings.cfg and set "SCREENSHOT_SUPERSIZE" to whatever you want.

(Emphasis mine)

That is if "only" is to be read as "exclusively", but having a separate key to take high-res and standard screenshots is actually very useful. One can only guess why Squad didn't go all the way when they integrated that functionality.

Also, the "burst" function is nice to have, although this can be approximated with window manager scripting tools.

Here's hoping to this mod getting another lease of life, it still has its place in the modern day and age of non-beta KSP 1.x

Edited May 26, 2015 by Corax

I just downloaded this and it's amazing. I just wanted to rebind the keys so that I don't accidentally do something else or take a screenshot by accident, but when I go to rebind, it doesn't work. I want to make the GUI toggle the numpad / key and the screenshot button the numpad * key, and when I set the config file, it doesn't work. It worked fine with default binds, I was just hoping to remap them to a better place.

Any help is appreciated.

http://imgur.com/a/2ntdB

Thanks,

--Mike
